title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
short_plot_summary: An inventor creates a machine that makes it rain food, and chaos ensues when the machine goes haywire.
explanation: A scientist, representing Flint Lockwood, the main character and inventor
A cloud, symbolizing the weather-related aspect of the movie
A hamburger, illustrating the type of food that rains from the sky
A plate of spaghetti, showcasing another food that falls from the sky
A flask, representing Flint's invention and his scientific experiments
